title: Debartha Paul
text:
Hi! Welcome to my blog. I am a Statistics student with a special interest in Stochastic Processes. This is my website, and I will keep updating it with a variety of my projects, ideas and (maybe?) articles. I am eager to know what you think and would be very glad if you could point out my mistakes and all. Just drop me an email.

Education
Presidency University, Kolkata | M.Sc Statistics | Sep 2022 - July 2024
Presidency University, Kolkata | B.Sc Statistics(Hons.) | Aug 2019 - June 2022


Interests
Stochastic Processes | Time Series Analysis | Bayesian Inference

title: SimpleLinReg.jl: My first ever Julia package
text: This package is a result of my preparation for the Google Summer of Code, 2023. I build this package from the groundup using Julia. The package currently consists of 1 function which enables anyone to find the simple linear regression for two variables.

title: SimpleLinReg.jl: My first ever Julia package
text: This package is a result of my preparation for the Google Summer of Code, 2023. I build this package from the groundup using Julia. The package currently consists of 1 function which enables anyone to find the simple linear regression for two variables.

title: SimpleLinReg.jl: My first ever Julia package
text:
Installation
This package is not intended for the Julia general package repository so we have to install it using the GitHub address.

Step 1- Open Julia. Then run the following command:

using Pkg
Pkg.add(url = "https://github.com/itsdebartha/SimpleLinReg.jl.git")
